title: Beverly Hills Cop III
writer: Danilo Bach, Daniel Petrie Jr., Steven E. de Souza
short_cast: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Héctor Elizondo, Timothy Carhart, John Saxon, Theresa Randle, Alan Young, Stephen McHattie, Bronson Pinchot
cast: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Héctor Elizondo, Timothy Carhart, John Saxon, Theresa Randle, Alan Young, Stephen McHattie, Bronson Pinchot

desc: When fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to investigate a murder, the trail leads to an unlikely setting: an amusement park.
